headline: What Catalysts Could Shift the Narrative for Marsh McLennan Amid Evolving Analyst Views?
summary: Marsh & McLennan Companies has seen its fair value price target lowered slightly from $232.42 to $228.53, in light of updated analyst perspectives. This modest adjustment comes as the insurance sector experiences mixed signals, with both supportive factors and new challenges shaping near-term expectations for the stock.
